column15: operation mode of the second heating circuit for 430
operation mode of the second heating circuit for 430
operation mode of the second heating circuit for 470
operation mode of the second heating circuit for 470

column5: Feriensollwert: 4.5=frostprotect, holiday temperature of the second heating circuit
Feriensollwert: 4.5=frostprotect, holiday temperature of the second heating circuit
HK2 Raumsoll Manuell: room setpoint in operation mode manual of the second heating circuit
HK2 Raumsoll Manuell: room setpoint in operation mode manual of the second heating circuit
HK2 Quick Veto Temp: manual override setpoint of the second heating circuit
VF1 Sensor: second heating circuit's flow temperature and sensorstate
Brennerkreispumpe: first heating circuit (burner circuit) pump's state
Zirkulationspumpe: control state of the circulation respectively loading pump (functionality of the pump depends on the configuration)
Hk1P_Kol1P_P1_Port: first heating circuit pump's state
Rückmeldung HK2-P: second heating circuit (mixer circuit) pump's state
Mischerstatus: Geschwindigkeit mit der der Mischer verfahren wird (negative Werte = Mischer wird geschlossen, positive Werte = Mischer wird geöffnet)

column15: type of the second heating circuit

column5: Min. Vorlauftemp.: lower limitation of the second heating circuit's flow temperature
Min. Vorlauftemp.: lower limitation of the second heating circuit's flow temperature
Max. Vorlauftemp.: upper limitation of the second heating circuit's flow temperature
Max. Vorlauftemp.: upper limitation of the second heating circuit's flow temperature
Heizkurve: heating curve of the second heating circuit
Heizkurve: heating curve of the second heating circuit

column15: room temperature modulation of the second heating circuit
room temperature modulation of the second heating circuit

column5: HK2 Offset Sommerbetrieb: summer offset of the second heating circuit (if outside temperature > room setpoint + summer offset => heating is OFF; applies to comfort and night setback setpoint; no influence if room temperature modulation is set to "thermostat")

HK2 Offset Sommerbetrieb: summer offset of the second heating circuit (if outside temperature > room setpoint + summer offset => heating is OFF; applies to comfort and night setback setpoint; no influence if room temperature modulation is set to "thermostat")
Parallele Speicherladung: Heizbetrieb und Speicherladung parallel
Vorlaufsolltemperatur: flow temperature setpoint of the second heating circuit
Estrichtrocknung Tag: Aktiver Tag der estrichtrocknungsfunktion
Estrichtrocknung Tag: Aktiver Tag der estrichtrocknungsfunktion
Estrichtrocknungstemperatur: flow temperature setpoint for the current day of floor pavement drying
Akt. Solltemperatur: current setpoint for the second heating circuit considering all basic conditions passed to the control algorithms
Frostschutz-Verzögerung: delay before frost protection is activated
Pumpensperrzeit: 0=off, heating circuit pump's maximum blocking time for pump's energy saving function
MaxPreheatingMinutes: in steps of 10, maximum time of enabling the heating before the heating time window starts
Kesselvorabschaltung: in steps of 10, maximum time of starting the lowering operation before the heating time window ends
HC2_ContinuosHeating: -26=off, when the outside temperature falls below this threshold temperature the continuous heating function is started (off <=> function is disabled)
Temperaturüberhöhung: excess temperature (flow temperature's setpoint is increased by this value to keep the mixing valve in its control range)
IsInOneDayHoliday: indicates that the VR61 is in one day holiday mode
IsInBankHoliday: indicates that the VR61 is in bank holiday mode
IsInOneDayBankHoliday: indicates that the VR61 is in one day bank holiday mode
IsInImpactVentilation: indicates that the VR61 is in impact ventilation mode
IsInSystemOff: indicates that the VR61 is in system off mode
HK2 Quick Veto aktiv: manual override of the second heating circuit enabled
Voraufheizung aktiv: bit-array where a set bit indicates that preheating is active for the corresponding heating circuit
Vorarabschaltung aktiv: bit-array where a set bit indicates that early cut off is active for the corresponding heating circuit
Pumpensperrzeit aktiv: bit-array where a set bit indicates that pump's energy saving function is active for the corresponding heating circuit

column15: identification of the last eight EEPROM inconsistencies
